attributes.action: allow the people to apply to elect a new MP/MSP if they are unhappy with them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the people in the area are unhappy with their MP/MSP, they may have to wait years before they get the chance to vote them out.
I propose people should be able to apply to the Government for an election when they are unhappy with their MP/MSP.
